actions.text: Committee on Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sasser. With written report No. 101-518. Additional and minority views filed.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977 for a period not to exceed 30 days
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977 for a period not to exceed 30 days.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Legislative Line Item Veto Seperate Enrollment Authority Act.

summary.text: Amends the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to direct the Secretary of the Senate or the Clerk of the House of Representatives, when any general or special appropriation bill or any bill or joint resolution making supplemental, deficiency, or continuing appropriations passes both Houses of the Congress in the same form, to cause the enrolling clerk of the appropriate House to enroll each item of the bill or joint resolution as a separate bill or joint resolution. Applies this Act to bills and joint resolutions agreed to by the Congress during the two-year period beginning on this Act's enactment date.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Legislative Line Item Veto Seperate Enrollment Authority Act.
